name: TradingView
tag_list: free, online, stock, charts, forex, fx, invest, community, public, social, network, trade, market, financial, business, cloud, ipad, iphone, android, html, tool, finance, learning
overview:
TradingView is an online community for investors and people who want to learn about the markets.

They all can join this site for free, and start figuring out in which direction the market is really going. TradingView.com features desktop-quality charts made with HTML5, which are meant to let even the most inexperienced folks around know what is what in financial terms. Connect with people who’ve already seen their share of good investments, and learn how it’s done by taking a look at the concrete examples they give you. Analyze the markets using their ideas and tools, such as indicators and drawings. Moving Averages, Volume, Gann, Fibonacci, Elliot waves are all popular tools used by investors to determine next price moves. Unique feature is the ease of sharing your ideas with friends, classmates or followers. You can publish static or live charts to the gallery, Twitter, StockTwits, or simple send a direct link to your chart. Sharing live charts on forums and blogs is the new easy way to see where the market went and if your predictions were correct. Load New Bars feature will automatically load latest market data into your chart without leaving the page. And knowing who to talk to is hardly difficult, since the homepage lists all the most popular and better-ranked traders. You can even find someone to guide you when it comes to specific stocks in a couple of clicks. Once you publish an idea, get instant feedback from other users with their thoughts and opinions. The site’s really that easy to use. Learn, analyze, and share â€“ become a better investor.
